author: Universal Pictures
description:
After finding Ann (Naomi Watts) roaming the streets of New York City, Kong takes her to Central Park where they slide all over the ice and play in the snow. Check out this iconic scene that encompasses Ann and Kong's relationship before Kong's battle with six Navy planes!
